page.title: 06FARM SURVEY
page.content: Grid 71-42 1. LLETY GWILYM OWNER:WILLIAM DAVIES 50 acres STOCK: 250 sheep. Owner since 1950. Grid 70-44 1. FRONDIRION OWNER:TECWYN WILLIAMS Fields: 20 acres;rough grazing:100acres;mountain pasture:700 acre. Alsorents 32acres from BRON MANOD. STOCK: 275 sheep. Mainly grazing land. Has farmed here for 8 years and looks upon l985 as a good year with over 200 lambs born. Grid 70-43 1. BRYN RHUG OWNER:DAFYDD ROWLANDS Land: 84 acres -mainly grazing. Bought fields from TEILIAU ISAF in l979. STOCK: 30 milking cows; 180 sheep. Has farmed here for 34 years. Grid 70-44 NEUADD DDU EIFION WILLIAMS 25 acres grazing and silage.50 sheep with 42 lambs born in 1985. Fleece sold at Porthmadog.
